issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Remove duplicate implementations of collect_expr
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4925](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4925). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are two separate implementations of collect_expr, one in the sql planner, one in the optimizer. We should have a utility package perhaps that both can delegate to.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4925?focusedCommentId=16794314) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Handled in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3939
